edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog

Class ECF2mUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog.ECF2mUtility

  • public class ECF2mUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a utility class for elliptic curve classes over F2m field. It operates some functionality that is common for every elliptic curve over F2m.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Detail

      • checkSubGroupMembership

        public boolean checkSubGroupMembership(DlogECF2m curve,
                              ECF2mPoint point)
        checks if the given point is in the given dlog group with the q prime order. A point is in the group if it in the q-order group which is a sub-group of the Elliptic Curve. The basic assumption of this function is that checkCurveMembership function has already been called and returned true.
        Parameters:
        curve -
        point -
        Returns:
        true if the given point is in the given dlog group.

      • checkAndCreateInitParams

        public GroupParams checkAndCreateInitParams(java.util.Properties ecProperties,
                                   java.lang.String curveName)

      • getGroupType

        public java.lang.String getGroupType()
        Returns:
        the type of the group - ECF2m

      • mapAnyGroupElementToByteArray

        public byte[] mapAnyGroupElementToByteArray(java.math.BigInteger x,
                                   java.math.BigInteger y)
        This function maps any group element to a byte array. This function does not have an inverse,

        that is, it is not possible to re-construct the original group element from the resulting byte array.

        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of a point in the curve (this function does not check for membership)
        y - coordinate of a point in the curve (this function does not check for membership)
        Returns:
        byte[] representation
